page.title: 15House Interiors
page.content: The average family house has three bedrooms, a kitchen, lounge, hall, dining/living room and, possibly, an attic or roof space for storage. Many houses are{centrally heated,}the most popular fuel being gas. Most homes have a{telephone. The kitchen will probably have a sink and built-in cupboards with working surfaces over them. A cooker{(gas or {electricity)}and refrigerator are usually standard. Other electrical equipment may include a mixer, a toaster, a kettle, a deep freeze unit and a dish washer. Micro-wave ovens are becoming popular. A{television set}and record/cassette player will be found in most lounges or living rooms. The bathroom may have a shower unit over the bath or a separate shower with a lavatory and wash basin.
